string-array.name: wisconsin_descriptions
string-array.item: Deep-fried. Cheese. Beer. Yeah, we’re still having trouble processing the majesty of it all.
“Stadium sauce” is the diplomatic way of saying, “We can’t guarantee all the alcohol is cooked out of this dish.”
The only food groups that matter, in sandwich form: beer, bread and cheese.
The Midwest: where cities might as well be named after their signature dishes.
